title: Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Access to Employment
Interview Descriptions: I had a verbal interview for 45 minutes with two members of the Access Team, they asked a variety of questions. It was followed by a resume critic for 30 minutes.
Interview Questions: Why do you think you are the best candidate for this position?

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Access to Employment in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions: Recruiter was very professional and passionate about the company and she answered all of my questions in detail.  Company itself seems very healthy and has potential for growth.
Interview Questions: Tell me a time when you had to deal with a difficult customer.

title: Human Resources Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Access to Employment (Toronto, ON) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions:
The interview process is quite standard, but takes longer than expected. 
I applied for the job online and got a call next week. They asked questions about my skills and experience and also tested my soft skills.
